website_summaries.verdict: While it provides a very convenient way to soothe your canine's anxiety, the results for this calming pheromone diffuser aren't typical with all dogs.
pros: Works by diffusing pheromones into the air that are known to calm stressed canines
Can work in areas up to 700 square feet
You get 3 diffuser refills for the price
cons: Dogs with separation anxiety may not be calmed by it
Refills only – the diffuser is a separate purchase
One refill only lasts about 30 days

customer_reviews.title: Don't recommend
customer_reviews.text: I bought several-- We were in the process of moving and I purchased enough for the current home and some to put at the new house to help ease the puppies. We would check on them every couple of days. About 2 weeks the top portion of the assembly that plugs is was brown and looked like over heating and they smelled burned. We checked all of them and all the same. We immediately drove to the new house and found the same. We unplugged all of them. We have used them in the past. First time this has happened. I would not recommend due to safety
customer_reviews.author: JE

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver for our dogs!
customer_reviews.text: Our dog started having anxiety issues after we one of out other dogs passed, especially when we got ready to go somewhere. Then we got a puppy which seemed to help. However once he got used to the puppy it was the same thing. We asked the vet for suggestions and she mentioned D.A.P. which she also uses in the office and at home since she has recuse dogs! It had helped our dogs tremendously and we can tell if it runs out because the symptoms start to return.
customer_reviews.author: Book Lover at Heart

customer_reviews.title: Helpful
customer_reviews.text: Got for a new dog -- who was 10 1/2 when he got stuck in a shelter as his owner died. I adopted him and wanted to help with his separation anxiety. Seems to work
customer_reviews.author: Gardening 1

customer_reviews.title: Not my dogs
customer_reviews.text: This product is advertised as a way to calm your dogs down. It does not seem to calm them down at home and when I take them somewhere with me, now they seem to get very anxious so it does seem to affect them but not in a positive way. So as far as I am concerned with my dogs this is a no go.
customer_reviews.author: James D. Vickers

customer_reviews.title: It does not "solve" the separation anxiety, BUT it ...
customer_reviews.text: It does not "solve" the separation anxiety, BUT it DOES take down the anxiety a notch. My dogs used to have tantrums when I came home from work, not they are able to settle down much faster after using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Must have for fearful dogs or dogs w/anxiety
customer_reviews.text: This has calmed my dog from her anxiety and fears beyond what i think pharmaceuticals could. But i went all natural before trying pharmaceuticals! Adaptil is a pharamone lactating mother's secrete that naturally calms your dogs of all their fears! It takes 30 days to get a good handle on how it will work.But I saw a change in my scared of life dog in 2 weeks time! & shes only gotten better!
customer_reviews.author: Prime member

customer_reviews.title: I have 3 of the most high strung dogs. ...
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 of the most high strung dogs. I can actually tell when this runs out because they start acting insane again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adaptil
customer_reviews.text: We use the Adaptil Plug in for our terriers who are all rescue dogs. We keep them plugged in in the rooms that they spend the most time. It seems to keep them calmer than they would be with out it. Their storm fear is still there, but at least they can relax in their crates when the storm hits (it does not allow them to snooze on the sofa, but they feel safe in their "dens").
customer_reviews.author: GA Patti

customer_reviews.title: Worth A Try - Works in The Situation I am using it Now
customer_reviews.text: In the situation I am using this them this time around they work great. I have one plugged in under the window the woofing communicator sits at the most of the day. It seems to really help. I unplug it at night to help save the life of it. Also, use the collar and spray. i did not find it helpful with a foster dog that I had that had crate anxiety. Worth a try depending on your situation.
customer_reviews.author: Linda G

customer_reviews.title: Works and really calms dogs
customer_reviews.text: There is no flavor or comfort to this / but it works really well to calm my dogs and has helped to mellow them enough so there is play fighting not real fighting. Plus, the one who was terrified of storms is now only worried and no longer turns into a shivering mess.
customer_reviews.author: Leela Fireside

customer_reviews.title: Happy dogs once again!
customer_reviews.text: I started using this product after I learned my schizophrenic nuisance neighbor was terrorizing my dogs when I went to work, then would call animal control on me for their barking. While the product didn't completely appease them(this was at least 5 days a week for up to 15 hrs a day) I blame it on situation, not product. Now that I am in a house away from the jerk, I find that my kids are happy and don't exhibit as much anxiety, such as persistent licking of paws, whining, destructive chewing and barking. I hated sedating and medicating the kids before going to work, and this really helped.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: good deal
customer_reviews.text: these are available at pet supply stores for a lot more and i'm glad i found them here for a pretty good deal. i have a siberian husky with separation anxiety. i've been using dap diffusers for a while along with training and her anxiety has gone from severe to moderate to mild. she does regress from time to time but that's mostly due to poor training periods. i've noticed that some people are under the impression that this is a quick fix but, while it isn't a miracle-worker, it's helps. if your dog has separation anxiety, i would recommend giving this a try in addition to training exercises, not as a replacement for them.
customer_reviews.author: lorio

customer_reviews.title: So Far It's Not Working
customer_reviews.text: So far it's not working. Have it plugged in. Have had it several days now so that scent should have been built up enough to work. Will try this supply then decided if I buy it again...
customer_reviews.author: Kandinsky9999

customer_reviews.title: Great for nervous dogs
customer_reviews.text: I have a couple of dogs that get a little nervous when I travel out of town. I will plug one of these in about a week before I leave, and they do absolutely perfect. Without having these plugged in they will have accidents in their kennel and try to break out of their Kennels.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Calms my two miniature dachshunds! Big time improvement! ...
customer_reviews.text: Calms my two miniature dachshunds! Big time improvement! They say it give off a scent the get from their mother that calms them. Really works. Plug it in near where you are!
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Great for stopping dog aggressive behavior.
customer_reviews.text: This product really does lessen anxiety and temper issues with pets, when dog sitting with unfamiliar dogs, and when doing foster care with animals. It is a must have at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia S. Link

customer_reviews.title: Super nice but IMPROVE YOUR SHIPPING MATERIALS!
customer_reviews.text: I love using these - they don't have the skin irritating problems that the collars can sometimes cause. I happen to use them in conjunction with the collars, but I was careful to check for skin irritation at first. The seller's packaging has a LOT to be desired (they simply threw them into an envelope and mailed them out with no protection - I'm surprised they arrived in one piece!). The boxes were mangled beyond repair but luckily the plug ins were unharmed.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars Plus
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. Originally got it for an old dog with separation anxiety (14 years old). After it was plugged in the RV for about 30 minutes, no more "yelling" and barking. Instantly quieted the dog, the new puppy and the neighbors in the campground loved it too. I'm using it now for a puppy who has more energy that any of my others before, and its very very helpful. I couldn't recommend this product enough.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Worked for us
customer_reviews.text: This stuff has worked wonders for us. We have an obsessive licker, and when this is plugged in for a while, it really decreases that behavior, I'm assuming by reducing anxiety. At one point we noticed that the licking came back even with the unit plugged in, it turned out that it had run dry - replaced the juice and things when back to how they were.
customer_reviews.author: HWA Technologies

customer_reviews.title: Works for our dog
customer_reviews.text: This is the right refill for our plug-in system. Our dog was having 'empty nest syndrome' when the kids went off to college. This definitely helps him sleep through the night.
customer_reviews.author: Fasnacht Lady

customer_reviews.title: The product works very well to as a PART of ...
customer_reviews.text: The product works very well to as a PART of a program help my dog's separation anxiety in conjunction with a therapeutic approach to helping her become more confident through obedience and socialization classes, and a gradual approach with the help of a professional trainer.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce - Elgin, IL

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: We got a rescue dog (Maltese) who could not settle down after several months. A friend told me about this and I swear it made a difference from the moment it was plugged in. Fast shipping from seller.
customer_reviews.author: roscoe

customer_reviews.title: Worth the investment.
customer_reviews.text: I have a dog who gets severely anxious with thunderstorms. using this, in conjunction with several other products (calming spray, calming collar, cbd oil) helps him tremendously.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Grasso

customer_reviews.title: Works like a harm in keeping my dog calmer and discouraging marking.
customer_reviews.text: This product was the one thing that finally worked at preventing my dog from marking in our house almost daily. Our cats even seem to be calmer.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Cotrupi

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for my dogs
customer_reviews.text: This did not work at all for my dogs. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Deb T

customer_reviews.title: Seems crazy but works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical about using this, but after years with a dog that chews door, eats curtains, etc., I wanted to see if this would help calm her down in the new house. I plugged it in and it seems to have a very calming effect on her. In fact, rather than lay down on one of her doggy beds, she chooses to lay in front of the outlet where the D.A.P. is and sleeps on the rug. I recommend it, especially if you have tried a lot of other things and you are still having trouble with your dog calming down.
customer_reviews.author: KC South Park

customer_reviews.title: So far no results
customer_reviews.text: This product is supposed to reduce a dogs anxiety. It has been two weeks and so far no change
customer_reviews.author: Pali Mike

customer_reviews.title: Dog trainer recommended
customer_reviews.text: I use this in the room where I keep my dogs’ crates. They seem to like being in there a whole lot more when I have it plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Works but prefer adaptil collars
customer_reviews.text: It does calm my rescue dogs but adaptil collars are much more effective.
customer_reviews.author: kk

customer_reviews.title: A gift from above
customer_reviews.text: I have been using DAP for my dogs for about 10 years. My last dog was high strung and after years of trying to correct his behavior, we found DAP and he was so much better. One of our current dogs was a neglected pup before rescued and was scared of everything. DAP also helped him to be less anxious. It's priceless to see a dog who was so scared to be able to relax and be happy!
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: This really works! Have one for each room and ...
customer_reviews.text: This really works! Have one for each room and dogs are so much more relaxed. People are also since dogs are unless it is working for humans..
customer_reviews.author: Lu John

customer_reviews.title: Calming influence
customer_reviews.text: I rescued two wild dogs and purchased these refills to help calm them as they became accustomed to my home. They worked great and I still use them when I travel to keep the dogs at ease. The only downside is you need to replace the plug-in unit after a couple of bottles as it gets really hot.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: May or may not work for all dogs
customer_reviews.text: Not sure this works... tried it for a few months. Didn't notice much difference in our dogs behavior.
customer_reviews.author: Risk Manager

customer_reviews.title: It worked!
customer_reviews.text: I just moved and dogs were mixed up and fighting one another. This product has made them more relaxed and no fighting in the first month.
customer_reviews.author: Estella

customer_reviews.title: I purchased to try to avoid giving antidepressant. Worked ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased to try to avoid giving antidepressant . Worked really well for my 8 yr old "alone in tolerant" female chocolate lab. I ended up having to do both this product and low dose Prozac which worked wonders when paired together.
customer_reviews.author: Pinkie71

customer_reviews.title: no help  yet
customer_reviews.text: So far not improving problem, have one more to use, it’s a lot of money for nothing if it doesn’t kick in!

customer_reviews.title: Vet reccomened.
customer_reviews.text: This product was reccomened to us by our et Saw results within days.

customer_reviews.title: Great for some dogs
customer_reviews.text: My dog doesn't respond to this, but my cats respond to this company's cat version. However, I know people whose dogs have great success with this, so I know my dog is just one of the few who naturally don't respond.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Can't believe how great this works!
customer_reviews.text: When I first bought this I was sure I was flushing my money down the toilet. I couldn't have been more wrong. My dog was having 'accidents' because of jealousy over a new baby. She hadn't had an accident since we plugged it in.
customer_reviews.author: CityNurse

customer_reviews.title: DAP Plug Ins
customer_reviews.text: This product is incredible. It works for any foster dog I bring into the house, and also helps tremendously for one of my dogs who has issues (urinating in the house, excessive crying, etc) I strongly recommend this to anyone who may have an anxious dog or a new dog in their home. This seller is very reliable, great prices and ships QUICK!
customer_reviews.author: PC Ballard-Hailey

customer_reviews.title: not sure this stuff really works
customer_reviews.text: My title says it all. I gave it an honest try for about 6 months. Saw no change in the dog's demeanor, especially at night. Finally started giving her over the counter melatonin which helped her sleep at night better than pacing.
customer_reviews.author: DianeM

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this product
customer_reviews.text: I have a female english bulldog and when we were told by her vet that this would work, I rolled my eyes. After 15 minutes of plugging it in, it worked like a charm. We love it and use several in our house at one time to keep our baby girl calm. When she gets wound up, she walks over to it and smells it and goes lay down. Would highly recommend trying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Coyote

customer_reviews.title: So far so good, does seem to really calm the poodle down .
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, does seem to really calm the poodle down .

customer_reviews.title: dogs love it
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this! They are so much calmer and better behaved. They let me know when it's empty

customer_reviews.text: Might be helpful to some dogs, my dog seemed unaffected and I ran 2 of these at the same time in a small home

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works. Was having issues with a move (& Thunderstroms) with my dog. This helped her with both. She's still scared of Thunderstorms but at least she won't shake the entire time.

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be helping my fearful dog be more comfortable when strangers visit our house.

customer_reviews.title: The online amazon price is such a money saver
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product many many years and have had great success. With a blenderd family/pets this helps keep the peace of unnecessary barking/whining and anxiety.

customer_reviews.title: Great Calming Product for Anxious Dogs
customer_reviews.text: I have three rescue dogs and two of them have significant anxiety. Adaptil is very helpful in keeping my pups calm.

customer_reviews.title: adaptil is great for my boxers, they get nervous with the summer storms and fireworks add it a few days in advance of fireworks
customer_reviews.text: adaptil is great for my boxers, they get nervous with the summer storms and fireworks add it a few days in advance of fireworks and just leave it in for the storms!

customer_reviews.title: Help my dogs to come down from aggression
customer_reviews.text: I was able to use these products with my dogs had begun fighting and we needed to find a way for them to get out of there Alpha aggressive mode. This product helped a lot.

customer_reviews.title: lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: I was at the end of my rope with my poor dog. Her anxiety was so bad. The vet recommended D.A.P. It took about a month to really start working. She no longer has to be confined and is so much calmer when I leave. No accidents! Love the product. Also bought the spray. I use it on her bed and sometimes her collar.

customer_reviews.title: It seems to work

customer_reviews.title: Dog sedative
customer_reviews.text: This product works very well on my dog. He is very hyper, and when we are gone for any length of time, he stresses. This product was recommended to us by our vet. I am pleased with the lower price through Amazon!

customer_reviews.title: Pet anxiety
customer_reviews.text: Used this product to help control my dogs anxiety when other people come over. Works really well.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT, GREAT SERVICE

customer_reviews.text: My minpin is much more calm since I started using this product.

customer_reviews.title: This product arrived early and was a good buy!
customer_reviews.text: This product has a calming effect on my cocker! Her older sister died recently, and she has had a hard time adjusting to being the only dog in the household. This product arrived early and was a good buy!!

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money to me

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This product has really helped our separation anxiety stricken collie make it through the work day. I was skeptical but have seen great results. Definately worth a try. Recommended to us by an animal behaviorist.

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: My new rescue kept peeing on my silk drapes : ( . Since the diffuser went in the room ...no more pee and you can't smell it
customer_reviews.author: deborah h.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.text: My dog suffered from separation anxiety while my fiance and I were at work. She'd regularly urinate on our carpet in the same spot. Once we got this product, the peeing stopped. It's truly amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Ross Boss

customer_reviews.title: DAP Works!
customer_reviews.text: I just wanted to say that DAP works. My older Husky has always been the nervous type and as she's aged, she's had more accidents and I believe it's due to her age and the recent death of our other Husky. The DAP mellows her out just a little. - Enough that she's not pacing and having accidents, yet she's still her spunky self. This is a great product.

customer_reviews.title: Worth a try

customer_reviews.title: Pheromones for dog
customer_reviews.text: Hi -- This is the second dog I've tried this product with. The first showed absolutely NO difference in behavior, with or without. Our present dog calms a LITTLE, but the difference isn't remarkable. I've heard they do great things for some dogs, but evidently mine are not among them.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: D.A.P.
customer_reviews.text: This product work very well. My dog had separation anxiety when we first adopted hm. He kept on tearing up things and wont go into his crate. Now he goes in to his crate with no problems and we leave out around the house and he does not tear things up. He is very calm now.

Instead of running and hiding under the bed or in a closet, he just hangs out on the floor near the outlet where we have this plugged in. Being that people in my neighborhood love using fireworks to celebrate every holiday, this has really helped.

customer_reviews.author: Sara-Anne Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Worked for our Corgi
customer_reviews.text: Our older dog has become restless at night and waking up our Corgi. With the Adaptil, he wakes up, but is quiet until she quiets down. We have it plugged in by his crate.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle L Conner

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: No difference from what I bought at the Vets but much cheaper. Helps my anxious dog stay calm when I have to leave him alone.
customer_reviews.author: mm.lovelife

customer_reviews.title: it helps a lot
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 very high strung terriers and this helps keep them calm. when they have bad days it isn't nearly as bad. we're all happier because of it.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Lane

customer_reviews.title: Dog Calming Defuser
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work pretty good. Since our Yorkie was a rescue with major issues, it did seem to help, and we are still using it as a tool in fixing her anxiety and seperaton issues.
customer_reviews.author: shesha

product_meta.title: 3 Pack ADAPTIL Calm Home Diffuser Refill for Dogs (144mL)
product_meta.description: ADAPTIL Diffuser contains DAP and offers a natural and convenient way to help manage stressrelated behaviors in your dog during: challenging situations (fireworks, loud noises, staying alone at home) adapting to new surroundings (adoption, moving home, new family member or pet). The efficacy of ADAPTIL has been demonstrated by numerous studies published within reputable scientific journals and presented at international conferences (under the trademark DAP until 2011). ADAPTIL is a behavioral pheromone treatment, not veterinary medicine. If there are signs of disease or other medical issues, consult your veterinarian.
feature_bullets: Reduces or prevents stress related behavior
Calms dogs during thunderstorms, fireworks, visits by strangers, or moving to a new home
Helps puppies adapt to new environments
One diffuser vial lasts up to 4 weeks
